fixes.name: DV01 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR ParamEndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = ParamEndDate,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted nested IF logic to DAX using VAR for parameter values. Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) per rules. All field references were mapped to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. Preserved original numeric literals and conditional structure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters]), and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
